sentences.cn: “我实际上住在切斯特附近。”——“具体在哪里？”
你知道她的下落 吗 ?

sentences.en: He became a person whose whereabouts is [ are ] unknown to me.
sentences.cn: 他的 下落 我不知道.

sentences.en: He showed great reluctance to reveal his whereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他极不愿意说出他的行踪。

sentences.en: His whereabouts have been utterly unknown so far.
sentences.cn: 迄今他的下落全然未知.

sentences.en: I live in a village near to Germaine Greer and know whereabouts she lives.
sentences.cn: 我住在杰曼·格里尔家附近的村子里，知道她具体住在哪儿。

sentences.en: The police are anxious to hear from anyone who may know the whereabouts of the firearms.
sentences.cn: 警方急盼任何可能知道这批武器下落的人提供线索。

sentences.en: We are currently trying to trace the whereabouts of certain sums of money.
sentences.cn: 我们目前正试图找到某些钱款的下落。

sentences.en: Whereabouts did I leave my bag?
Whereabouts in Liverpool are you from?
sentences.cn: 你从利物浦什么地方来的？

sentences.en: Whereabouts in Scotland do they live?
sentences.cn: 他们住在苏格兰的什么地方 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: the place or area where someone or something is
